00063 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 void CNewVisionView::OnUpdate(CView* pSender, LPARAM lHint, CObject* pHint)
00065 {
00066         CSize cameraView= CSize(GetDocument()->cameramodel.w, GetDocument()->cameramodel.h);
00067         CSize floorView = CSize(GetDocument()->floormodel.w, GetDocument()->floormodel.h);
00068         switch (m_type) {
00069                 case VIDEO_VIEW :
00070                         SetScrollSizes(MM_TEXT,  cameraView, CSize(cameraView.cx/10, cameraView.cy/10), CSize(1, 1));
00071                         break;
00072                 case SCENE_VIEW :
00073                         SetScrollSizes(MM_TEXT,  cameraView, CSize(cameraView.cx/10, cameraView.cy/10), CSize(1, 1));
00074                         break;
00075                 case ACTIVITY_VIEW :
00076                         SetScrollSizes(MM_TEXT,  cameraView, CSize(cameraView.cx/10, cameraView.cy/10), CSize(1, 1));
00077                         break;
00078                 case FLOOR_VIEW :
00079                         SetScrollSizes(MM_TEXT,  floorView, CSize(floorView.cx/10, floorView.cy/10), CSize(1, 1));
00080                         break;
00081                 default :
00082                         SetScrollSizes(MM_TEXT,  cameraView, CSize(cameraView.cx/10, cameraView.cy/10), CSize(1, 1));
00083         }
00084         CZoomView::OnUpdate(pSender, lHint, pHint);
00085 }
00086 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void CNewVisionView::OnContextMenu(CWnd* pWnd, CPoint pos) {
00088         // handle body right click menu
00089         CPoint point = pos;
00090         pWnd->ScreenToClient(&point);
00091         point = ClientToImage(point);
00092         { // +++ begin data processing critical section 
00093                 CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
00094                 m_match = GetDocument()->bodymodel.FindBodyIDTag(GetDocument()->bodymodel.body, cvPoint2D32f(point));
00095         } // +++ end data processing critical section   
00096         if (m_match >= 0) {
00097                 m_bodyMenu.GetSubMenu(0)->TrackPopupMenu(TPM_LEFTALIGN | TPM_RIGHTBUTTON, pos.x , pos.y, this);
00098                 return;
00099         }
00100 
00101         // handle display right click menu
00102         CMenu *submenu, *menu = &m_displayMenu;
00103         switch (m_type) {
00104                 case VIDEO_VIEW :
00105                         submenu = menu->GetSubMenu(0);break;
00106                 case SCENE_VIEW :
00107                         submenu = menu->GetSubMenu(1);break;
00108                 case ACTIVITY_VIEW :
00109                         submenu = menu->GetSubMenu(2);break;
00110                 case FLOOR_VIEW :
00111                         submenu = menu->GetSubMenu(3);break;
00112                 default:
00113                         submenu = menu->GetSubMenu(0);
00114         }
00115     submenu->TrackPopupMenu(TPM_LEFTALIGN | TPM_RIGHTBUTTON, pos.x , pos.y, this);
00116 }
00117 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 void CNewVisionView::OnLButtonDown(UINT nFlags, CPoint pos)
00119 {
00120         m_click = true;
00121         CWnd::OnLButtonDown(nFlags, pos);
00122         CPoint point = ClientToImage(pos);
00123         CNewVisionDoc* pDoc = GetDocument();
00124         if (m_type == VIDEO_VIEW && pDoc && pDoc->trackermodel.m_initialized) {
00125                 if (pDoc->trackermodel.IsRunning()) {
00126                         m_wasRunning = true;
00127                         pDoc->OnPause(); 
00129                         //pDoc->trackermodel.IsPaused();
00130                 }
00131                 else                            
00132                         m_wasRunning = false;
00133         
00134                 CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
00135                 BodyModel* bm = &pDoc->bodymodel;
00136                 m_match = bm->FindBodyIDTag(bm->body, cvPoint2D32f(point));
00137                 // On Ctrl+click toggle body path manual confidence to zero
00138                 if (pDoc->m_ProcessingMode == PLAYBACK && (nFlags & MK_CONTROL) ) {
00139                         BodyPath *bp;
00140                         if (pDoc->m_TrackingData.data.Lookup(m_match, bp)) {
00141                                 if (bp->isManual)
00142                                         bp->isManual = false;
00143                                 else {
00144                                         bp->isManual = true;
00145                                         bp->manualConfidence = 0;
00146                                 }
00147                         }
00148                         m_match = -1;
00149                 }
00150                 
00151                 else if (pDoc->m_ProcessingMode == PLAYBACK && (nFlags & MK_SHIFT) ) {
00152                 }
00153                 else if (m_match >= 0) {
00154                         m_drag = true;
00155                 }
00156                 else {
00157                         m_click_point = cvPoint(point); 
00158                 }
00159         }
00160 }
00161 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 void CNewVisionView::OnLButtonUp(UINT nFlags, CPoint pos) {
00163         CWnd::OnLButtonUp(nFlags, pos);
00164         if (m_click) {m_click = false;} else {return;}
00165         CNewVisionDoc* pDoc = GetDocument();
00166         CPoint point = ClientToImage(pos);
00167         if (m_type == VIDEO_VIEW && pDoc && pDoc->trackermodel.m_initialized) {
00168                 if (pDoc->m_ProcessingMode == PLAYBACK && (nFlags & MK_CONTROL) ) {
00169                 }
00170                 else if (pDoc->m_ProcessingMode == PLAYBACK && (nFlags & MK_SHIFT) ) {
00171                 }
00172                 else if (m_drag) {
00173                         CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
00174                         m_drag = false;
00175                         pDoc->m_TrackingData.Put((int)pDoc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber);
00176                 }
00177                 else {
00178                         CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
00179                         BlobRay br; br.p1 = m_click_point; br.p2 = cvPoint(point);
00180                         pDoc->bodymodel.body[pDoc->bodymodel.last_id] = new Body(&br, pDoc, pDoc->bodymodel.last_id, (int)pDoc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber);
00181                         pDoc->m_TrackingData.Put((int)pDoc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber);
00182                         if (pDoc->m_ProcessingMode == PLAYBACK && pDoc->m_MergeID != -1) {
00183                                 m_match = pDoc->bodymodel.last_id;
00184                                 pDoc->m_TrackingData.MergeID(pDoc->m_MergeID, m_match);
00185                         }
00186                         else 
00187                                 pDoc->bodymodel.last_id++;
00188                 }
00189                 //pDoc->UpdateOverlayInfo();            
00190                 pDoc->trackermodel.SetPosition();
00191                 Invalidate(); UpdateWindow();
00192                 if (m_wasRunning)
00193                         pDoc->OnPlay();
00194         }
00195 }
00196 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 void CNewVisionView::OnMouseMove(UINT nFlags, CPoint pos) {
00198         CWnd::OnMouseMove(nFlags, pos);
00199         CNewVisionDoc* pDoc = GetDocument();
00200         CPoint point = ClientToImage(pos);
00201 //      CPoint pos2 = ImageToClient(point);
00202 //      m_cClickPoint = point;
00203 //      Invalidate();
00204 //      UpdateWindow();
00205 //      char c[40];
00206 //      sprintf(c, "(%d:%d)>(%d:%d)>(%d:%d)", pos.x, pos.y, point.x, point.y, pos2.x, pos2.y);
00207 //      m_wndStatusBar.SetPaneText(FRAME_NUMBER_STATUS_POS, c);
00208         if (m_drag && m_match >= 0 && m_type == VIDEO_VIEW && pDoc && pDoc->trackermodel.m_initialized) {
00209                 CAutoLock dataLock( &m_dataCriticalSection); 
00210                 BodyModel* bm = &pDoc->bodymodel;
00211                 Body *b; bm->body.Lookup(m_match, b);
00212                 CvPoint3D32f p = pDoc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(point), b->top.z);
00213                 b->MoveHeadTo(p);
00214         }
00215 }
00216 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00217 void CNewVisionView::OnKeyDown(UINT nChar, UINT nRepCnt, UINT nFlags) {
00218         CWnd::OnKeyDown(nChar, nRepCnt, nFlags);
00219         if (nChar == VK_DELETE && m_type == VIDEO_VIEW && m_drag  && m_match >= 0) {
00220                 CNewVisionDoc* pDoc = GetDocument();
00221                 if (pDoc->m_cursor == CURSOR_DEFAULT ) {
00222                         pDoc->OnBodyDeleteID();
00223                         m_match = -1; // no body to match
00224                         pDoc->trackermodel.SetPosition();
00225                         Invalidate(); UpdateWindow();
00226                         if (m_wasRunning)
00227                                 pDoc->OnPlay();
00228                 }
00229         }
00230 }

00243 void CNewVisionView::OnDraw(CDC* pDC)
00244 {
00245         // display poster frame
00246         CNewVisionDoc *doc = GetDocument();
00247         if(doc->m_initialized) {
00248                 switch (m_type) {
00249                         case FLOOR_VIEW :
00250                                 ShowImage(pDC, floorImg);
00251                                 break;
00252                         default:
00253                                 doc->trackermodel.ShowPosterFrame(this->m_hWnd, pDC->m_hDC);
00254                                 //CPen *pen = new CPen(PS_SOLID, 2, RGB(0,0,255));
00255                                 //displayLeftBodies ? doc->bodymodel.DrawFrame(pDC, 0, 0, pen) : 1;     
00256                                 //delete pen;
00257                 }       
00258         }
00259 }
00260 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00261 void CNewVisionView::ShowImage(CDC* pDC, IplImage* pIplImage)
00262 {
00263         // Works only for 3-channel images !
00264         CImage pImage;
00265         pImage.CopyOf(pIplImage);
00266         pImage.Show(pDC->m_hDC, 0, 0, pImage.Width(), pImage.Height(), 0,0);
00267 }

00306 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00307 void CNewVisionView::OnActivateView(BOOL bActivate, CView* pActivateView, CView* pDeactiveView) {
00308         if (bActivate && m_pDocument) {
00309                 CNewVisionDoc *doc = GetDocument();
00310                 if (!doc->m_initialized)
00311                         return;
00312                 doc->trackermodel.SetVideoWindow(GetSafeHwnd());
00313                 CPoint p1 = this->GetScrollPosition();
00314                 switch (((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->m_type) {
00315                         case VIDEO_VIEW :
00316                                 m_layout.cx = doc->trackermodel.cx;
00317                                 m_layout.cy = doc->trackermodel.cy;
00318                                 SetDisplaySize();
00319                                 doc->trackermodel.SetBitmapImage(doc->trackermodel.m_bitmap, doc->trackermodel.cx, doc->trackermodel.cy);
00320                                 doc->trackermodel.SetVideoPosition(new CRect(CPoint(-p1.x, -p1.y), m_displaySize), false);
00321                                 break;
00322                         case SCENE_VIEW :
00323                                 m_layout.cx = doc->trackermodel.cx;
00324                                 m_layout.cy = doc->trackermodel.cy;
00325                                 SetDisplaySize();
00326                                 doc->trackermodel.SetTransparency(100);
00327                                 doc->trackermodel.SetBitmapImage(doc->trackermodel.m_bitmap, doc->trackermodel.cx, doc->trackermodel.cy);
00328                                 doc->trackermodel.SetVideoPosition(new CRect(0,0,doc->trackermodel.cx, doc->trackermodel.cy), false);
00329                                 break;
00330                         case ACTIVITY_VIEW :
00331                                 m_layout.cx = doc->trackermodel.cx;
00332                                 m_layout.cy = doc->trackermodel.cy;
00333                                 SetDisplaySize();
00334                                 doc->trackermodel.SetBitmapImage(doc->trackermodel.m_bitmap, doc->trackermodel.cx, doc->trackermodel.cy);
00335                                 doc->trackermodel.SetVideoPosition(new CRect(0,0,doc->trackermodel.cx, doc->trackermodel.cy), false);
00336                                 break;
00337                         case FLOOR_VIEW :
00338                                 m_layout.cx = doc->trackermodel.fcx;
00339                                 m_layout.cy = doc->trackermodel.fcx;
00340                                 SetDisplaySize();
00341                                 doc->trackermodel.SetTransparency(100); 
00342                                 doc->trackermodel.SetBitmapImage(doc->trackermodel.m_floorBitmap, doc->trackermodel.fcx, doc->trackermodel.fcy);
00343                                 //doc->trackermodel.SetVideoPosition(new CRect(0,0,doc->trackermodel.fcx, doc->trackermodel.fcy), false);
00344                                 doc->trackermodel.SetVideoPosition(new CRect(0,0,0,0), false);
00345                                 break;  
00346                         default:
00347                                 ;
00348                 }
00349         }
00350 }
00351 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00352 void CNewVisionView::OnViewFullscreen()
00353 {
00354     /* if normal mode - start (enable) full screen mode */
00355     if(!m_fullScreen){
00356         m_fullScreen = true; 
00357 
00358         /* Variable saveParent is used to save 
00359         address of parent window (address is necessary 
00360         in disabling this mode -to place view in former position) */
00361         m_savedParent = this->GetParent();
00362 
00363         /* this (our view) is placed on desktop window -
00364         CWnd::GetDesktopWindow() - Returns the Windows desktop window */
00365         this->SetParent(GetDesktopWindow());
00366 
00367         CRect rect; /* temporary variable */
00368 
00369         /* Next function copies the dimensions of 
00370         the bounding rectangle of the desktop */
00371         GetDesktopWindow()->GetWindowRect(&rect);
00372 
00373         /* view is placed on desktop */
00374         this->SetWindowPos(&wndTopMost,rect.left,rect.top,
00375                 rect.right,rect.bottom,SWP_SHOWWINDOW);
00376                 //this->GetDocument()->trackermodel.SetVideoPosition(&rect, true);
00377                 SetZoomArea(&rect);
00378     }
00379     else {
00380         /* disable full screen mode */
00381         m_fullScreen = false;
00382 
00383         /* our view is placed in old window - using address saveParent 
00384         (pointer that has been used in former if-section) */
00385         this->SetParent(m_savedParent);
00386 
00387         /* pointer to the main frame and function RecalcLayout() 
00388         (run on behalf of CmainFrame object) 
00389         - that repositions all control bars 
00390         in the frame (#include <MainFrame.h>) */
00391         ((CMainFrame *)AfxGetMainWnd())->RecalcLayout();
00392                 //this->GetDocument()->trackermodel.SetVideoPosition(new CRect(0,0,this->GetDocument()->trackermodel.cx,this->GetDocument()->trackermodel.cy), false);
00393                 CRect rect(0,0,this->GetDocument()->trackermodel.cx,this->GetDocument()->trackermodel.cy);
00394                 SetZoomArea(&rect);
00395                 this->GetParentFrame()->SetActiveView(this);
00396     }
00397 }
00398 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00399 BOOL CNewVisionView::OnScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, BOOL bDoScroll) {
00400         SequenceProcessor *sp = &this->GetDocument()->trackermodel;
00401         CPoint p1 = this->GetScrollPosition();
00402         sp->SetVideoPosition(new CRect(CPoint(-p1.x, -p1.y), m_displaySize), false);
00403         return CZoomView::OnScroll(nSBCode,nPos,bDoScroll);
00404 }
00405 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00406 void CNewVisionView::UpdateVideoPosition() {
00407         SequenceProcessor *sp = &GetDocument()->trackermodel;
00408         CPoint p1 = GetScrollPosition();
00409         if (sp->m_initialized) { // +++ begin data processing critical section  
00410                 GetDocument()->Message(String::Format("x={0} y={1} cx={2} cy={3}", p1.x, p1.y, m_displaySize.cx, m_displaySize.cy));
00411                 CRect r(CPoint(-p1.x, -p1.y), m_displaySize);
00412                 sp->SetVideoPosition(&r, false);
00413         } // +++ end data processing critical section   
00414 
00415 }
